tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BoxerRecords (
    boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    record_win INT,
    record_loss INT,
    injury_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE boxers (
  boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Boxers (
  boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  weight_class VARCHAR(20),
  age INT,
  record INT
);

CREATE TABLE Injuries (
  injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  boxer_id INT,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  date_occurred DATE,
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES Boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  boxer_id INT,
  date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES Boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Championships (
  champ_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  champ_name VARCHAR(50),
  weight_class VARCHAR(20),
  date_won DATE,
  boxer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (boxer_id) REFERENCES Boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Boxers (
    boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight INT,
    height INT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Injuries (
    injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    severity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    match_date DATE,
    winner_id INT
);
